segments.content: I'm glad to inform you that my first email sent from [ConvertKit](https://thisweekinreact.com/convertkit) has been received by most of you: my email provider migration is successful!
segments.sourceMdx: I'm glad to inform you that my first email sent from [ConvertKit](https://thisweekinreact.com/convertkit) has been received by most of you: my email provider migration is successful!
segments.translated_content: 很高兴通知各位，我通过[ConvertKit](https://thisweekinreact.com/convertkit)发送的首封邮件已成功送达大多数订阅者：邮箱服务迁移顺利完成！

segments.content: And I'm also very happy with the reception of my [article on `useSyncExternalStore`](https://thisweekinreact.com/articles/useSyncExternalStore-the-underrated-react-api)! Thanks for your many feedbacks, I will try to write more soon. The idea is to have a 100% dedicated email on a specific topic, to learn something new in a short time.
segments.sourceMdx: And I'm also very happy with the reception of my [article on `useSyncExternalStore`](https://thisweekinreact.com/articles/useSyncExternalStore-the-underrated-react-api)! Thanks for your many feedbacks, I will try to write more soon. The idea is to have a 100% dedicated email on a specific topic, to learn something new in a short time.
segments.translated_content: 同时非常感谢大家对[《useSyncExternalStore：被低估的React API》](https://thisweekinreact.com/articles/useSyncExternalStore-the-underrated-react-api)一文的热情反馈！我会尽快撰写更多技术解析。未来计划推出100%聚焦单一技术主题的专刊，帮助大家在短时间内掌握新知识。

segments.content: Otherwise, the weekly curation newsletter is back. This is a bit of a special edition: I've put all the interesting links from the last few weeks. There are way too many and I can't comment on them this time 😅 Don't worry, we'll resume the usual format with my comments at the end of September when I get back from vacation!
segments.sourceMdx: Otherwise, the weekly curation newsletter is back. This is a bit of a special edition: I've put all the interesting links from the last few weeks. There are way too many and I can't comment on them this time 😅 Don't worry, we'll resume the usual format with my comments at the end of September when I get back from vacation!
segments.translated_content: 本周的精选资讯简报将恢复更新。这是期特殊版本：我汇总了过去几周所有值得关注的链接。内容实在过于庞杂，这次无法逐一评述😅 别担心，等我九月底度假归来后，就会恢复带点评的常规格式！

segments.content:
* 😘 **Recommend the newsletter to your friends**: it really helps!

* 📨 Reply to this [**email**](mailto:sebastien@thisweekinreact.com): feedback is welcome

segments.content: Have you already tried [Storyblok](https://www.storyblok.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=display\&utm_campaign=AWA_SPON_TWIREACT_TRA\&utm_content=thisweekinreact_en)? It's the headless CMS with a Visual Editor designed for both developers and marketers!
segments.sourceMdx: Have you already tried [Storyblok](https://www.storyblok.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=display&utm_campaign=AWA_SPON_TWIREACT_TRA&utm_content=thisweekinreact_en)? It's the headless CMS with a Visual Editor designed for both developers and marketers!
segments.translated_content: 您尝试过[Storyblok](https://www.storyblok.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=display&utm_campaign=AWA_SPON_TWIREACT_TRA&utm_content=thisweekinreact_en)吗？这款无头CMS配备可视化编辑器，专为开发者和营销人员双重需求设计！

segments.content: Use Storyblok React SDK to quickly build reusable components and fetch the content to create your React, Next.js, Remix, or even React-Native applications, websites or eCommerces.
segments.sourceMdx: Use Storyblok React SDK to quickly build reusable components and fetch the content to create your React, Next.js, Remix, or even React-Native applications, websites or eCommerces.
segments.translated_content: 使用Storyblok React SDK快速构建可复用组件并获取内容，轻松创建React、Next.js、Remix乃至React-Native应用、网站或电商平台。

segments.content: Check out [Technology Hub](https://www.storyblok.com/technologies?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=display\&utm_campaign=AWA_SPON_TWIREACT_TRA\&utm_content=thisweekinreact_en) and find it out yourself!

segments.translated_content: 立即访问[技术中心](https://www.storyblok.com/technologies?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=display&utm_campaign=AWA_SPON_TWIREACT_TRA&utm_content=thisweekinreact_en)亲身体验！

segments.content: The only hiring platform that puts developer health first. We connect React and React Native freelancers with great companies committed to improving developers' mental, physical, and emotional health and well-being.
segments.sourceMdx: The only hiring platform that puts developer health first. We connect React and React Native freelancers with great companies committed to improving developers' mental, physical, and emotional health and well-being.
segments.translated_content: 唯一以开发者健康为核心的招聘平台。我们为 React 和 React Native 自由职业者对接注重改善开发者心理、生理和情感健康的优质企业。
